text:
@SpeakerPelosi The social workers are traumatized by what they see. You have mattresses that have feces on them, blood, hospital bands on the floor. What people are seeing is so horrible that they walk out & they say, "I don't want to go back in there." 
#COVID19 https://t.co/39Bk26l9JX
